item.title: General shot in Moscow conscious after surgery, Russian media say
item.description: Lt Gen Vladimir Alexeyev was shot several times inside his apartment block on Friday morning.

item.title: US wants Russia and Ukraine to end war by June, says Zelensky
item.description: The Ukrainian leader says difficult issues remain, as Russia carries out further strikes on energy facilities.

item.title: S Korean crypto firm accidentally pays out $40bn in bitcoin
item.description: The company quickly realised its mistake and managed to recover virtually all the missing tokens from customers.

item.title: Zambian leader backs traditional Ghanaian outfit after online trolling
item.description: Some Zambians outraged Ghanaians by describing the outfit worn by their president as a "blouse".

item.title: Trump threatens tariffs for countries trading with Iran
item.description: The order did not specify the rate that could be imposed, but used 25% as an example.
